items.sentence: Tom baked three dozen cookies for Mary\'s party.
Tom and Mary are both happy to be friends again.
Tom and Mary are leaving the day after tomorrow.
I know who you are, and I know why you\'re here.
I could\'ve gotten involved, but I chose not to.
Tom remembered the last time he had hugged Mary.
Tom reminded Mary to go to the bank before 5:00.
How do you know it was Tom who broke the window?
Mary is one of the prettiest women in Australia.
Mary usually wears a bathing cap when she swims.
